member.name: M:HBOS.FS.AMP.UPD.WinUI.Main.loadUserControl(System.Windows.Forms.UserControl,System.String)
member.summary: Load a user control into the display area panel and set attributes. The User control should implement ICustomInit which has the method CustomInitialization(). In case any user control does not implement the interface, this method has the IF check so the appln does not break.
member.param: Text to display within the title bar
